# Sample Markdown Document

This is a sample markdown document for testing extraction.

## Introduction

Markdown is a lightweight markup language that allows you to format
text using simple syntax. It is widely used for documentation,
README files, and content management systems.

## Features

### Headings

Markdown supports multiple heading levels from H1 to H6.

### Lists

- Bullet point one
- Bullet point two
- Bullet point three

1. Numbered item one
2. Numbered item two
3. Numbered item three

### Code Blocks

```javascript
function hello() {
  console.log("Hello, World!");
}
```

## Conclusion

This document demonstrates various markdown features and should
be properly extracted by the text extractor module.

The chunker should respect semantic boundaries when splitting
this document into smaller pieces for retrieval.
